item.title: Ford Johnson Algorithm
item.description: 偶然发现 AtCoder，上去注册了准备试试，结果卡在practice contest… 问题倒是很简单： There are N balls labeled with the first N uppercase letters. The balls have pairwise distinct weights. You are allowed to ask at most Q queries. In
